description.brief: iLibrary driver for the IMU myAHRS+

package.description: Library and application driver for the myAHRS Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) The myAHRS+ is a low cost high performance AHRS(Attitude Heading Reference System). Its attitude output is more stable to acceleration and magnetic disturbances then other low cost AHRS/IMU products. Communication and configuration are enabled via UART/USB interface for user applications.
